m_szDocTitle: In Sweden, your next car-charging spot could be at someone else's house - Roadshow
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- In Sweden, your next car-charging spot could be at someone else's house Volkswagen's diesel deadline delayed...again In Sweden, your next car-charging spot could be at someone else's house Renault has launched a service called Elbnb where people share their power outlets with drivers of electric vehicles for a price. Bonnie Burton Crave freelancer Bonnie Burton is the best-selling author of "The Star Wars Craft Book" and host of the Web show "Geek DIY."
